channel.title: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]
channel.description:
Hello, I try a few times to host my server. I watch a lot of video. But all this video suck because they wont give any proof of if it work or not. And i'm very tired of that type of video.
If someone can help or at least give a video who really work. I will be verry Happy.
Thank you.
-Wanttobecoders

item.title: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

Moparisthebest:

You don’t put the noip in your server config, just leave the ip in there blank.

Thank for the help but finally its was only my firewall.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

I have DUC,Minecraft_Server.exe

I create an No-ip address.

I portforward the minecraft Official Port.

I ask my friend to join but its not working for him and for me.

But with Hamachi I can connect to the server.
but my friend cant.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

no idea since you don’t give much info
have you downloaded the DUC too?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]

item.title: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:2, topic:384861”]1. never use hamachi, it won’t attract many players and give you an unprofessional look (bahahah he can’t even portforward)
2. go to portforward.com and follow a guide there suitable for your router.

good luck[/quote]

I know how portforward. I add the port to my router and I check it on a port checker and it say it open.
After I create a No-ip and I add it to the server.property and i ask my friend to try to join it and it wont work.

Any one have an Idea of why it not working ?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]

item.title: I need help to host my minecraft Server [Hamachi or Portforwarding]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

  1. never use hamachi, it won’t attract many players and give you an unprofessional look (bahahah he can’t even portforward)
  2. go to portforward.com and follow a guide there suitable for your router.

good luck

Read full topic
